title: Represent and analyze - v-max from f and a-max

content.question: A block is attached to the bottom of a vertical spring and oscillates with a frequency <math alttext="f sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and a maximum acceleration of magnitude <math alttext="lowercase a sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. What is the block’s maximum speed?

choices.label: <math alttext="f sub 0, lowercase a sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="2 pi f sub 0, lowercase a sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="the fraction lowercase a sub 0 over f sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>0</mtext></msub></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction lowercase a sub 0 over 2 pi f sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>0</mtext></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction lowercase a sub 0 over 2 pi f sub 0, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>f</mi><mtext>0</mtext></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
